page.title: 08 MILL ON THE BRUE BRUTON-TWO
page.content: The Mill On The Brue Activities Centre was opened in 1981 by Brian & Alison Shingler. There are two houses where the children sleep, Gant's Mill Farm- house and Trendle Farmhouse. At Gant's Mill there are 4 bunk bed rooms sleeping 32, and 2 staff bedrooms There is a marquee dining room, 2 common rooms and a large wet weather covered space plus tuckshop! At Trendle Farm there are 3 bunk bed rooms sleeping 32 and 2 staff bedrooms. There are also similar facilities to Gant's Mill. If necessary extra accom- modation can be arranged in tents. The address for further information: Gant's Mill Bruton Somerset
